short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Weatherly extension: location-based data, wind, atmospheric conditions, astronomy, real-time updates & accurate weather forecasts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝗪𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗹𝘆 is completely free, with no ads and no tracking, no data mining, and no selling of your data 🙅‍♂️.

𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐩𝐫𝐢𝐯𝐚𝐜𝐲 𝐢𝐬 𝐬𝐚𝐟𝐞 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐮𝐬🔒.

 ⚖️ 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐞𝐫 𝐋𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐰𝐞𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐞𝐫 𝐅𝐚𝐬𝐭! ⚡️

Get ready to experience the ultimate in weather forecasting with 𝗪𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗹𝘆, the innovative browser extension that puts you in control of your weather experience. With a sleek and intuitive design, 𝗪𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗹𝘆 provides you with a wealth of information at your fingertips, ensuring you're always prepared for whatever the weather throws your way.

𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐞𝐡𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐖𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫 𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐬

Weatherly offers a vast array of weather details, including:

☁️ Current conditions, temperature, and feels-like temperature
🕰️ Hourly and 7-day forecasts, complete with temperature graphs and precipitation forecasts
🌫️ Atmospheric conditions, including humidity, pressure, and cloud cover
🌕 Astronomy insights, featuring moon phase, moonrise, and moonset times
💨 Wind direction, speed, and gusts, as well as solar energy and radiation levels
🏥 Air quality information 
📊 Visualize Your Forecast

Weatherly's interactive graphs and charts make it easy to visualize your weather forecast. Enjoy:

📈 7-day temperature graphs
🕰️ 12-hour hourly, humidity, precipitation, and wind direction graphs
❓️ Easy switching between Fahrenheit and Celsius temperature units
🎨 Customize Your Experience
 📬 Postal/Zip Code Search

𝗠𝗮𝗸𝗲 𝗪𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗹𝘆 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗼𝘄𝗻 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵:
🌑 Dark mode and multiple theme options
📋 Toolbar badge for quick weather updates
📸 Screenshot feature to share your weather forecast with friends and family

𝗠𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶 𝗟𝗮𝗻𝗴𝘂𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲:
🇬🇧 English
🇨🇳 Chinese
🇪🇸 Spanish
🇮🇳 Hindi
🇸🇦 Arabic
🇷🇺 Russian
🇯🇵 Japanese
🇦🇫 Dari
🇮🇷 Farsi
🇩🇪 German
🇮🇹 Italian

𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗖𝗵𝗼𝗼𝘀𝗲 𝗪𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗹𝘆?
🎉 Free, no tracking: Weatherly is completely free and respects your privacy
☁️ Accurate forecasting: Weatherly uses trusted sources to provide you with reliable weather information
👍 User-friendly interface: Easily navigate Weatherly's features and customize your experience
🌟 Experience the Future of Weather Forecasting

Add Weatherly to your browser today and discover a smarter, more personalized way to stay ahead of the weather!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

𝗩𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗛𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗿𝘆
--------------------------
𝑉𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛 2.5 | 𝑆𝑒𝑝𝑡𝑒𝑚𝑏𝑒𝑟 20, 2024
✨ Multi language feature added.
✨ Zip/Postal Code feature added.
✨ Some code refactor and small edits.

𝑉𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛 2.4 | 𝐽𝑢𝑛𝑒 09, 2024
✨ Ads section removed.
✨ Air Quality added for free.
✨ Some code refactor.

𝑉𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛 2.3 | 𝑀𝑎𝑦 31, 2024
✨ Issue with badge update resolved. 

𝑉𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛 2.2 | 𝑀𝑎𝑦 26, 2024
✨ All issues fixed! A more stable version is now live.

𝑉𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛 2.1 | 𝑀𝑎𝑦 23, 2024
✨Rollback to 2.0 due to a major frontend issue.

𝑉𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛 2.0 | 𝑀𝑎𝑦 21, 2024
✨ Groundbreaking Overhaul: We've completely forward-engineered the project, introducing a revolutionary new architecture that sets the stage for future innovation.
✨ API Evolution: Our API has undergone a significant transformation, enabling faster, more reliable, and more accurate data exchange.
✨ UI Revolution: Our designers have crafted a stunning new user interface that's not only visually appealing but also more intuitive and user-friendly.
✨ Feature Explosion: We've added a plethora of new features, check description for it.

𝑉𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛 1.9 | 𝐽𝑢𝑙𝑦 25, 2021
✨ API Request Issue Resolved: We've fixed the pesky API request issue that was causing trouble.
✨ Text Typo Mistakes Resolved: We've proofread and corrected all text typo mistakes to ensure a seamless user experience.
✨ Light Theme Color Gradient Changed: Our designers have refreshed the light theme color gradient to provide a more visually appealing experience.
✨ Uninstall Survey Form Added: We now collect valuable feedback from users who choose to uninstall our extension.

𝑉𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛𝑠 1.7 & 1.8 | 𝐽𝑢𝑛𝑒 16, 2021
✨ API Change: We've implemented a new weather provider to improve the accuracy and reliability of our weather data.
✨ User Interface Enhancements: We've made several tweaks to the user interface to improve usability and aesthetics.
✨ Feature Updates: We've removed Visibility and Chill, and added Cloud Area Fraction and Dew Point to provide more detailed weather information.
✨ Support Us: We've added a button to support our development efforts via Ko-fi (https://ko-fi.com/haidari).

𝑉𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛 1.6 | 𝐹𝑒𝑏𝑟𝑢𝑎𝑟𝑦 5, 2020
✨ Icon Issue Resolved: We've fixed the icon issue that was affecting Chromium and Chromebook users.
✨ Icon Color Update: We've updated the icon color to ensure it's visible on browser dark themes.

𝑉𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛 1.5 | 𝑆𝑒𝑝𝑡𝑒𝑚𝑏𝑒𝑟 30, 2019
✨ English (Imperial) Unit Added: We've added support for English (Imperial) units to cater to a broader user base.
✨ Dark Theme Added: Our designers have crafted a beautiful dark theme to provide an alternative visual experience.
✨ Auto Badge Update Issue Resolved: We've fixed the auto badge update issue to ensure seamless functionality.

𝑉𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛 1.4 | 𝑀𝑎𝑦 11, 2019
✨ Badge Status Update Issue Resolved: We've resolved the badge status update issue to provide accurate and timely updates.

𝑉𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛𝑠 1.2 & 1.3 | 𝑀𝑎𝑟𝑐ℎ 12, 2019
✨ Leave Blank City Name Issue Resolved: We've fixed the issue that allowed users to leave the city name blank.
✨ City Name Recommend Added: We now provide city name recommendations to help users find their desired location.

𝑉𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛 0.1 | 𝑀𝑎𝑟𝑐ℎ 3, 2019
✨ Initial Publish: Our extension was first published, marking the beginning of our journey to provide a top-notch weather experience.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
𝗕𝘂𝗴 𝗥𝗲𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝘀
If you encounter any issues or have feedback, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at support@wlyapp.com or hello.rafihaidari@gmail.com. 

We appreciate your help in making our extension better!
